The majestic virtue of all Buddhas is such in the past, future, and present.
When the Buddha was in the country of Magadha, in a place of pure Dharma, that place was called the Pure Place of Questions.
When he first became a Buddha, his radiance was extremely bright.
There was a naturally-formed vajra lotus, surrounding him, extremely large.
There was a naturally-formed lion seat, on which all Buddhas of the past also sat, with the same rules and no differences.
In the Dharma of utmost equality, he was born and transcended.
The physical practices of all Buddhas are all equally complete, with bright unobstructedness.

The place of innumerable Buddhas, the place of innumerable Dharmas, the place of innumerable people in the great ten directions, and the place of innumerable Buddha lands are where the Buddhas of the past, future, and present are born.
The bodhisattvas each came from different lands to the great assembly, their number like the dust motes in ten buddha-lands.
One dust mote represents one bodhisattva, such is the limit.

The bodhisattvas who have been granted the position of one life to go are all in the ten directions, in the sutras of peace and security, all in the Dharma realm, all in the lands of the ten directions, all in the wisdom of nirvana in the ten directions, all in the past lives of the people of the world in the ten directions, all in the gradually deepening bodhisattvas, all in the Dharma of all wisdoms, all in the inner and outer dharmas, all in the unmoving and unshakable Dharma, all in the past, future, and present dharmas.
The bodhisattvas discussed like this:
The Buddha loves us.
What the bodhisattvas thought:
Show us the buddha-lands, like the dwelling place of the Buddha's practice.
They will hear and see the purity of our buddha-lands and the purity of our buddha-dharmas.
The Buddha's teachings will all be shown to us;ğŸ”½He will show us the times of the formation and destruction of our buddha-lands.
He will show us the buddhas appearing in our lands and the good and evil in our buddha-lands. The Buddha will show us all.

You have shown us the lands in the ten directions, the teachings of countless Buddhas, the ten abodes of bodhisattvas, the ten practices of bodhisattvas, the sutra of the ten repentances for bodhisattvas, the ten grounds of bodhisattvas, the ten supports of bodhisattvas, the ten dwelling places of bodhisattvas, the ten wisdoms of bodhisattvas, the ten samadhis of bodhisattvas, the ten flying abilities of bodhisattvas, the ten seals of bodhisattvas, the time when all bodhisattvas come flying, and the endless names of Buddhas.
At that time, the Buddha had us all protect the people of the world, and all the lands of the Buddhas in the ten directions were completely pure and free from defilement.
You have shown us the existence and non-existence of all the Buddha's knowledge, and have made all our evils and fundamental [afflictions] completely pure.
Please explain all dharmas for me, and resolve all my doubts - resolve all my doubts, and transcend them all - and cut off all my desires.
Show me the place where the Buddha abides, show me the realm of the Buddha's dharmas, show me the Buddha's awesome spiritual power, show me the Buddha's practice, show me the Buddha's strength.
Show me the Buddha's four forms of fearlessness, show me the place where the Buddha enters samÄdhi, show me the Buddha's transformations and what he does.
Show me the Buddha who has no one superior to him, show me the Buddha's supreme title, which no one can attain.
Show me the Buddha's faculties, show me the Buddha's flying, show me the Buddha's radiance, show me the Buddha's wisdom, show me the Buddha's four forms of fearlessness.
The Buddha knew the thoughts in the minds of all the bodhisattvas, and the Buddha manifested his radiance and awesome spiritual power.
